basics.name: Allie (Minh-Anh) Nguyen
basics.summary: I'm a Ph.D. student in Environmental Engineering at UC Berkeley, researching wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) and environmental microbiology. I'm passionate about environmental public health and engineering solutions to improve population safety and well-being.

work.name: Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering, University of California, Berkeley
work.summary: Project: Pandemic Readiness and Equity through Virus Epidemiology of Wastewater (PREViEW).

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
